alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Coastal Kenedy; Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy; Jim Hogg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 04 at 9:53AM CST until February 04 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32. For the Hard Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 24 possible. * WHERE...Kenedy, Jim Hogg, Brooks, and Inland Willacy Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until noon CST today. For the Hard Freeze Watch, from late tonight through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Brooks; Coastal Kenedy; Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy; Jim Hogg
